post:
Hello all!

We're back again with a new and different offers with dedicated servers starting from just $20/mo in LAX & MIA. If the offers below aren't up to your requirements please just contact one of our sales staff and we can provide a whole host of options.

Be aware all servers are manually setup and it may take up to 1 business day, for these dedicated servers only.

Los Angeles
<pre>Intel X3430 (or similar)
16GB DDR3 RAM
2x2TB HDD 
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit (swap to 100Mbit unmetered for $5/mo extra)
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$30/mo](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=212&currency=2) - Only 3 instock
<pre>Intel i3-2120 (or similar)
16GB DDR3 RAM
1TB HDD
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit (swap to 100Mbit unmetered for $5/mo extra)
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$20 with promo code G4U43LW5XX](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=198&currency=2) - Only 1 instock


Miami
<pre>Intel i3-2120 (or similar)
8GB DDR3 RAM
1TB HDD
10TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbit (swap to 100Mbit unmetered for $5/mo extra)
1Gbit private network
/29 IPv4, /64 IPv6</pre>
[$20 with promo code G4U43LW5XX](https://my.stockservers.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=200&currency=2) - Only 1 instock

Location Information
LAX - Test IP (69.12.66.26/2607:fcd0:0:a::2)
MIA - Test IP (173.44.32.10/2607:ff48:0:a:b:c:d:666)

Additional Information
All services benefit from Quadranets 3Gbit VEST DDoS protection and benefit from their enterprise grade network. All services are eligible for BGP sessions and bring your own IP.
